verbose_text: To quantify this cost, we formulated a secretory burden (SB) score for each SP gene i as a function of its encoded protein length L (i.e., number of amino acids) and number of disulfide (N DS) and glycosylation (N gly) sites : (Equation 1) SBi = Limed (L) + NDS, imed (NDS) + Ngly, imed (Ngly) where each property is normalized by the median (med) value among all of the SP genes.
